title: [Game mode suggestion] What was dead.
body: Simple concept. Use summoners rift, but with all the items in the game including the ones that was removed.

replies.body: How about all items but with only season 1 champs?

How about hardcore(1 life) or nomatter what stage of game, 2 min respawn to get the defensive players in, the junglers really active, and the noobs hated, really good for champs such as{{champion:86}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:14}}
Maybe a fun twist is that every item and champion could be returned to their most "OP" patch.
Can do blood raizor kog'maw again.
Can do blood raizor kog'maw again.
